name: persona-arcana-mobile
description: Mobile-first AI journal analysis app with dual AI services

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix mobile-app
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix mobile-app
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix mobile-app
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix mobile-app
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:cache
scripts.clean:deps: Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules, backend/node_modules, mobile-app/node_modules, package-lock.json, backend/package-lock.json, mobile-app/package-lock.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
scripts.validate:env: npm run validate:env --prefix backend && npm run validate:env --prefix mobile-app
scripts.setup:env: echo 'Copy .env.example files to .env and fill in your values' && echo 'Backend: backend/.env.example -> backend/.env' && echo 'Mobile: mobile-app/.env.example -> mobile-app/.env'
scripts.deploy:guide: echo 'See DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md for platform-specific deployment instructions'
